name: FUTURE//PAST
description:
You have broken into a secret lab to get a time manipulating watch, solve puzzles and platform to escape the lab.

CONTROLS -

Move-

 -     WASD / Left Joystick

Look-

-      Mouse / Right Joystick

Time Skip-

 -     Left Click / Right Trigger

Jump-

-     Space Bar /  A

Pick Up

-     E /  X

Quick Restart

-     R
